actions.name: Missing Link
actions.description:
Trigger: The user declares Transform.

Effect: The user keeps the Attacks on the Active List and their current Abilities, instead adding the target's attacks to their Active List, and gaining their Abilities as Extra Abilities for the duration of the transformation. The user still copies the target's stats, [Stage Change] effects, typing and forme as normal.

actions.name: Missing Link (Passive)
actions.description: Passive: The user takes 25% less super effective damage.
